net.peierls.puzzle

Interface PuzzleSolver<T extends PuzzleState<T>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPuzzleSolver

    public interface PuzzleSolver<T extends PuzzleState<T>>
    Interface for algorithms that search for solutions to a puzzles of the parameterized type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<List<T>> solution(T initialState)
      Finds a solution to puzzle defined by initial state, using the state filter supplied by that initial state.

    • Method Detail

      • solution

        Optional<List<T>> solution(T initialState)
        Finds a solution to puzzle defined by initial state, using the state filter supplied by that initial state.
        Returns:
        the solution to the puzzle as a list of states from the initial state to a solved state (inclusive), or an empty optional if solution is unreachable from initial state.
